document_data.mainbody:
he Hojori Temple was a front for the activities of the famous assassin and spy Kumo clan of Kozakura, many years before the early 14 century DR.
The Hojori Temple was used by the Kumo clan many decades before the . It was used to store the clans treasures as well as a unique weapon that belonged to a master assassin â€“ Ryomarus Harmless Staff. Sometime later, the temple was burglarized by the renowned thief called "Chicken" Wu-Wei, who got away with the temples many treasures, including Ryomarus Harmless Staff, becoming the target of Kumos wrath.
